alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:07PM CDT until June 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR HUNT COUNTY... At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caddo Mills, or 7 miles southwest of Greenville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Commerce, Royse City, Caddo Mills, Campbell, Greenville Club Lake, Greenville City Lakes, Josephine, Neylandville, Kellogg, Kingston, Cash, Clinton, Fairlie, South Sulphur, Center Point, Floyd and Dixon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
